name: Nature Domain
description: Clerics of the Nature Domain serve deities of the wild, blending divine power with primal forces to protect the natural world and command beasts and plants.

1.name: Nature Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Acolyte of Nature
1.description: You learn one druid cantrip of your choice and gain proficiency in one skill (Animal Handling, Nature, or Survival).

1.name: Bonus Proficiency
1.description: You gain proficiency with heavy armor.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Charm Animals and Plants
2.description: You can charm beasts and plants that fail a saving throw.

6.name: Dampen Elements
6.description: When you or a creature within range takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you can use your reaction to grant resistance to that instance of damage.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit with a weapon attack, you deal extra cold, fire, or lightning damage (choose when you gain this feature).

17.name: Master of Nature
17.description: You can command animals and plants, forcing a creature to obey you for a short time on a failed save.
